item.title: Template
item.description: Hugo uses the excellent go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic. In our experience that it is just the right amount of logic to be able to create a good static website. If you have used other template systems from different languages or frameworks you will find a lot of similarities in go templates. This document

item.title: 3A5000之UEFI
item.description: 经过两年的开发，龙芯平台的固件已经实现了 UEFI 规范，从 3A5000 开始默认使用支持 UEFI 的固件。
